message.body: Hey. Just wondering what time you walked Zoe today?
Ok, thanks. Could I get the spare key back from you after you finish the lunch walk tomorrow? I'll be at Beau till 4. If you feel like it, we could grab a beer or something.
Yeah I'll drop it off after the walk
Ok, I don't have my phone on me when working, so if I don't see you outside, come in. What are you up to tonight?
Ah, we could smell the fire from next door. All is ok, I hope.
No one was injured and minimal property was damaged
Shit. Good that you guys are ok. If y'all need any help, let me know.
It's not serious we just have to do some clean up
Ok, cool. Say hi to D for me. See ya tomorrow.
You in the area? I have potatoes and avo salsa if you want 'em.
